answers.answer: Are you on any anti-virals? I'm not a doctor but your prognosis to resolve your infection soon is very good.
No.. I am not on anti-viral. I forgot to mention that i am hbeag negative.

If your ALT is normal seems that you moved to inactive carrier state, it's possible that you'll become HBsAg negative sooner or later, it's already very low. But it also may take many years. Do you have any HBsAb (antibodies) detected ? It would be a good sign as well.

question: Hi.. m 39 year old, diabetic (in good control), Indian male. Hbsag detected in 2013.In Nov 13-HBSAG 80 iu/mlHBVDNA 2200 iu/mlIn Mar14-HBVDNA <20 iu/ml (it has remained same for past 2.5 years)Dec 14HBSAG 39 iu/mlDec 15HBSAG 25 iu/mlDec 16HBSAG 2.7 iu/mlHBVDNA <20 iu/mlLiver biopsy- fatty liver (15%), fibrosis stage 1.What shall I do?
title: Do I take medicines?
